text: Give Me a Book of Complaints () is a 1965 Soviet comedy movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov.Как Олег Борисов «отнял» приз Венецианского кинофестиваля у Роберта Де НироДАЙТЕ ЖАЛОБНУЮ КНИГУ It stars Oleg Borisov, Larisa Golubkina, and Anatoly Kuznetsov. ==Actors== * Oleg Borisov as Yuri Nikitin * Larisa Golubkina as Tatiana Shumova * Anatoly Kuznetsov as Ivan Kondakov * Anatoli Papanov as Vasily Kutaytsev * Nikolai Kryuchkov as Nikolay Ivanovich * Nikolai Parfenov as Ivan Postnikov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: Give Me a Book of Complaints
